name: Bear Witch Project
description:
"This isn't a cooking club!" You think as you enter the magic circle where the other bears start to chant. It seems you have accidentally entered a bear cult!

Better not let anyone know! Follow the example of the other cultists and they chant and  dance to blend in. This ritual can't really be summoning anything bad right?

Credits: the lazy bears!!

Barbara Szreder
Emese-Anna Hoppa
Jelmer Lukkien
Keandra Forrester-Addie
Svenja Scholl
Vivien Baguio

Diversifiers
  • Don't run, don't jump
  • Play on words
  • Piece of Cake

Thanks for #FemDevMeetup to  host this lovely gamejam!
